main event: A pilot reported seeing a large, round, flashing white and blue object over his aircraft at an altitude of about 2 miles above the horizon.
interesting points: The object appeared to be reflecting light and similar to a mass of burning gases.
The pilot estimated the object was 15 miles away in his 12 o'clock position.
The object was visible for over 5 minutes, from 0330Z to 0335Z.
The object was still visible when the pilot was approximately 100 miles away from the initial sighting location.
The report was filed by Lt. David Cleveland, the Senior Controller of the 32nd Air Division.
sighted object: a large, round, flashing white and blue object
